TopicTitle: Showoff your big huge ISS and Space stations!

Articles.Content:
All my space stations we're lost in a great attack from the great space kraken while on it's way to laythe to have Laythe 12's lander refuel to be able to rendezvous with the return vehicle, Sadly the great 2 stations one carrying the return vehicle the other going to refuel the lander once they were making their burn to rendezvous both of the stations started twirling then broke apart, One station's part hit the other and blew up all the stations...

(I like to make complicated missions, they're more satisfying!)

So i can't give any pics of mine... So heres a describe, And Showoff yours!

Zerfer Station:

My first ISS and Mobile refueling station, It was in service for 3-4 Kerbal Years.

In it's carreer it monitered, refueled and completed many missions for the KSC.

Until it was destroyed in a random space kraken tragedy.

Station 12:

The seccond station and mobile refueling and task fullfilling station.

It was in service for 3-4 Kerbal years as was the zerfer station, Zerfer station was the mother station to

Station 12. Serving as a communications and operation helper. It's carreer was long and well. Until it was then attacked with zerfer station in a freak Space Kraken Tragedy.

So there's mine! Go ahead and tell me yours!
This is not a bad idea for a thread. In fact, that's why somebody already made one. Bearsh, why don't you take some screenshots of your stations and post them there?
